title: Dívka
content:
V „ceně neutrality”, Dívka postava who appears only briefly. She can be found with kuchař near ohniště, north of tábor, but initially will not speak to the witcher. Only after Geralt leaves the camp the first times does she takes him aside to plead with him to kill Deidre, whom she considers a monster.

She then relates a story which tells of how she and her mother were forced by Deidre herself to watch as princess and her armed band slowly and cruelly tortured her father to death.

Úkoly
Vlčice
Poznámky

Though this character is named “Dívka”, she is obviously an adult.
